transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji namaskar sir
Customer: Namaste
Executive: Namaste main Krishul baat kar raha hun idhar se
Customer: Ji ji ji shree vasanta draypur ji ji ji namaskar
Executive: Namaskar madam happy wednesday
Customer: Sir happy saturday sorry
Executive: Same to you sir happy saturday
Executive: Happy saturday madam hello
Customer: Happy saturday sir same to you
Executive: Thank you mam actually
Customer: What about this one yesterday yesterday i received a call from vivek as well and he also confirmed ki theek hai because sir is looking for a fund only to aap karwa dijiye to unhone acknowledgement de diya hai to karwa dete hain sir sir kyunki ye unki taraf se hi acknowledgement tha kya hai ki mere maa ko aankhe ko aankhe ko surgery ho gaya mera operation hua
Customer: Okay
Customer: 10 din pehle 10 din pehle thoda idhar udhar doctor ke doctor ke paas ghum raha hun sir doctor se consultation rehte hain na
Customer: Okay
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ye matlab kuch problem tha sir ya cataract wo cataract ka haan haan mere mother ko mere maa ko mama ji ko
Customer: Okay
Customer: Ye aapko baar baar phone karke whatsapp pe shristi madam ka ye number kya bolte ye laptop pe kharch kar bolke bol raha 5 baje call kiya tha kal aur parso aapse main kal dopahar 3 baje baat kar raha tha madam
Executive: Ji ji ji
Customer: Aapke sath baat hone ke baad aadha ghante ke baad vivek sir call kar diya mere ko call kiya
Executive: Haan main bhi kyunki aap se baat hone ke baad maine aapko kaha tha na ek baar unse call karwati hun aapko pura anish amount kitna aata hai madam mere account mein wo pura bata diya kya 3 3000 debit karke baki 34000 wo
Executive: Jo bhi hai sir main aapko wo update de deti hun sir mujhe aap iske liye monday tak ka samay de doge initiate to kar denge
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai theek hai updates honge kyunki saturday sunday hamari accounts team working nahi hogi sir ki wo sara calculation aap service stop karte hain haan to monday tak aapke paas sara final update pahunch jayega
Customer: Ye south south south south saturday hai na aaj
Executive: Kya hai sir
Customer: Ye aaj aaj to south south saturday hai na
Executive: Haan lekin kal fir sunday hai sir
Customer: Haan kal sunday ko fir available nahi honge parso parso saturday haan to parso monday ko kyunki wo working honge to sara kyunki vivek ji ne de diya hai sir acknowledgement unhone de diya hai ki theek hai unhone aap se baat ki uske baad unka call aaya tha mere paas
Customer: Haan mera baat suno madam main kya bol raha hun kya mera doubt kya hai ki second saturday aap rakh rahe hain har mahine aapka aapka to private company hai na ye government company nahi hai na kyun aap every saturday bolke khush honge
Executive: To aap ye keh rahe hain main aaj aapko update laake do
Customer: Aisa nahi keh raha madam take care on time bola na ek hafte ek hafte ek mahine ke baad hi aap update kar sakte hain madam ye to government company nahi hai na private company kabhi bhi nahi dekha dmart ya reliance aisa rehta hai na second saturday only every saturday they will open sunday also they will open na because customers are only god and goddess to them
Executive: Nahi nahi we are available for incoming call sir if in case somebody calls to hum phone uthayenge bilkul hamare phone jo hai na wo mobile handset mein hai koi landline phone nahi
Customer: Ye to account section band rehta hai every saturday sunday
Executive: Every saturday sunday account section band band rakhte hain na
Executive: Chalo aapko sir main update jo bhi hai monday tak de dungi aapka rest aap fir ab theek hai kyunki aapka ye decision hai aap yahi chah rahe hain matlab hum to still chahte hain sir aap continue karo lekin agar aap nahi karna chahte aap baki decision aapka hai sir vivek ji ne bhi ab bol hi diya hai
Customer: Mere ko nahi to main uthana chahti 3 baje subah yahi baaten bolunga kabhi bhi ye baaten bolte nahi main pura mere ko irritation aa gaya kindly refund the amount
Executive: Okay thank you monday 11:30 baje aapko call
Executive: Sir is cheez ke liye jo maine aapko last time bhi process ye bataya hi tha ki hamara hum initiate ab kara rahe hain aur uske baad aapko jo amount reflect karta hai uske liye hame maximum seven working days to chahiye hi hote hain sir
Executive: Hai na kyunki hum yahan se initiate karenge fir aapke bank pe jata hai aur fir aapka jo bank hai wo aapko transfer karta hai aapke amount aapke
Customer: Haan wahi jo maine aapko bola tha ki wo seven to ten days jo rehte hain wo har ke case bhi rehte hain wo usme saturday sunday mein exclude karte hain chutti ki wajah se but still hum ab yahi karenge ki aapko next week mein ye sara conclude ho hum initiate karwate hain sir fir
Executive: Theek hai
Customer: Okay more confirmation do din mein aata hai
Executive: Wo aapko aayega haan haan wo hum khud call karke aap se puchte rahenge sir jaise hi hame update aayega na hum aapko samne se hi call karte rahenge
Customer: Shukriya madam shukriya
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai shukriya
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of the amount.

- Why second Saturday is observed.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to initiate refund process.

- Informed about account team not working on weekends.

- Executive will provide update by Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday by 11:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, second saturday, account section, update
